name: Bubbles (itch) (LAgg)
description:
Check out some of our other games! Aml | Less Is More Born Under Sea Rocks, but with an appetite to explore the Oceans and explore the world! Now that you've got yourself an ink gun, it's time to make those dreams come true! 🦑

Travel far and wide, discovering the exotic landmarks that the world has to offer! Meet the locals from towns far away from each other! 

The entire world is your new sea, and be sure to see all that it has to offer!

  • Move in the oceans to save the world.
  • Try to escape from ElMobedone with there laser guns and exploding traps.
  • Kill all the aliens that want to take water from earth.
  • upgrade your weapons and by new skins.
  • catch sunk underwater treasurers.
  • Use Screen Joystick to move and shot your with your ink gun.

Development Team

  • Programmer - Ahmed Mostafa (Twitter)
